website_summaries.verdict: Six-pack holder emblazoned with Roger Federer’s signature.
pros: This snazzy bag has gray with black letters and red accents on the zippers
Two large compartments can hold a lot of gear and racquets
cons: Problems with the zipper, which frays easily

customer_reviews.title: not really designed for carrying racquets
customer_reviews.text: Function-wise, it was poorly designed. When I put this bag on my back, the racquet compartment opens itself. The zip just can't keep it close. It needs some kind of latch or buckle to keep the bag closed.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Thin, plastic fabric
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this tennis bag. Material is plastic, not fabric. Looks great in the picture, but empty it is completely flat. There is no support in it at all. I wish I had spent the extra $50 and gotten a quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Roger Fed backpack
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. This is not a huge bag. I would not recommend it if you have to carry lots of gear. No separate shoe compartment. Fine for carrying two racquets, a can of balls and a towel. Inside pocket can hold phone or wallet but not both. Small pocket can hold small key fob. Straps are ok but a bit flimsy. I purchased for $39.00 but I see it advertised for $89.00...shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to carry but too small
customer_reviews.text: The backpack straps are easy to slip on and comfortable to carry, but its inside volume is small and a couple more pockets would be helpful. As I emptied my old Wilson Tennis bag contents into the new one I had to omit several items and stuff I put in the bottom of the new bag I haven't seen since putting them there.
customer_reviews.author: James of Irvine, CA

customer_reviews.title: This is one good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: This is one good looking bag ! It can hold six rackets comfortably, 3 on each side and has another small zipper for other items. I carry only three racquets at a time and use one side for balls, water etc.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking bag, but within the first week of owning it, I've already scuffed and scratched the hard black sides. I play on clay, and the dirt on the court is enough to scuff this bag. I'm disappointed it doesn't hold up any better than a Nike shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Neat bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the design a lot. It's also great to carry around and has plenty of space to fit my 3 racquets, tennis balls, change clothes and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chao

customer_reviews.title: Nice but missing an important feature.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Surprisingly does not look as wide like other bags but will fit 12 racquets. Had to return as I needed a separate shoe compartment. Those you will find on Yonnex and Babolat bags. A little pricey compared to most x12 bags but is molded so will stay in shape. It looks great overall and has thermo protection on both compartments.
customer_reviews.author: dtd3cebu

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wilson should be ashamed to put their name and Roger's name on this product. Buckles are very thin plastic and both broke when adjusting straps. Very thin material that feels very cheaply made. Do not let the great looking photo fool you. This bag is being returned today.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Low quality zippers are very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Zippers are really low quality. I even read reviews about how bad they were but still decided to get it. Bad choice. Side zipper pockets get caught every time you try to open or close. Zipper parts break easily too. Disappointing product especially being a big fan of their other products
customer_reviews.author: Jared Braegelmann

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis bag - Easy to carry and hard to miss!
customer_reviews.text: Bright color and easy access are my favorite aspects of this bag. Easy storage for your rackets and easy acces for the rest of your stuff. Holding up well thus far and I really like the look.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with a perfect amount of space
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag because my old one was too small. This one holds my 3 racquets, shoes, balls, extra shorts and tshirt with ease. The backpack straps are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bag, wish it had some different pockets
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag, but it holds a lot of rackets (I have 2) and I would prefer more pockets for balls, tape, and especially shoes. It's decent for what it is, but I'll probably pick out more of a "backpack" one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ian X Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I like the fabric and the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I like the fabric and the quality! It holds 3 racquets, a towel, my shoes, 2 cans of balls and 3 bottles of water. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: 3 zipper compartments. 1 great for rackets, 1 great for extras, 1 small front zipper-great for wallet, keys etc and more. Best bag and looks stylish too. Handle but can also be worn as a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl944

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold 3 rackets and a couple cans of tennis balls, a towel, and some tape and tournament grip. stylish and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ktran

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful design for a tennis bag with two smaller outside pockets for phone, wallet, keys etc., Also, two large racket compartments. I use the smaller of the two for my three rackets, and the larger for shoes, towel, clothes, can of balls, etc. These two pockets have a heat reflective lining so your rackets are protected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frizell

customer_reviews.title: Light and roomy backpack
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag is roomy Yet so light weight. Took it hiking with me and it’s comfortable around the straps too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Okay... not great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and my father thought it was too small for a tennis bag :(
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Moraga

customer_reviews.title: Great Men’s Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Hubby. He loves the room and the classy look. It’s light and has several compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Margo10S

customer_reviews.title: Get this !!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag- roomy without being humongous for a tween girl. Stylish and looks cool with the black lettering on black background
customer_reviews.author: Treebee

customer_reviews.title: but it is a really nice backpack. This one is smaller than previous models ...
customer_reviews.text: really lightweight, not so many pockets within, but it is a really nice backpack. This one is smaller than previous models from Wilson.
customer_reviews.author: Junior M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and excelent hard material on the sides. The side pockets has very useful compartments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Size For me. I got 4 tennis rocket and some pants and t Shirts
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great bag it has a sturdy outside and looks great fits my 2 rackets shoes slides extra pair of clothes tennis balls and much more space for other stuff
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: I had a problem in the zipper of the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem in the zipper of the bag just the 1st time I tried to open, it stuck and it tore, I do not know who to turn to, I live in Brazil and here they said I have to solve this in the USA, there is no way, someone from Wilson helps me ? rodrigo.baptista75@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: RODRIGO BAPTISTA

customer_reviews.title: Fits 3 rackets easy
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! I can fit 3 tennis rackets without them falling out! Just wish it had more pockets but definitely not a problem. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: STYLISH!!
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing about it is that when you put two rackets, the zip does not resist their movement and gets open
customer_reviews.author: Alireza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for my son for Christmas. Because it is all black I'm having our school logo embroidered on the front for him. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: If you are a tennis player, this is your bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing, great space and great quality, and looks amazing,love it. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Issam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am a Federer fan and I love to have this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stoneclock

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, good quality. Great for three racquets on one side and a bunch of gear in the other side. Side pocket is roomy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Skytraveler

customer_reviews.title: Simple Design
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting too much from this bag. It carries 2-3 racquets with a set of clothes and balls without a problem. I like the overall design. If you want something simple then try this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Love the backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for traveling light to play tennis. Not a lot of pockets and spots like the newer bags though. If you can find it at a great price, snatch it up!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It came earlier than expected! It was an amazing gift! Its so pretty/cool, it fits a lot of rackets, balls, even my water, cap, wallet etc. and the straps are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Isabel Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Not what we really expected from the description. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what we really expected from the description. It doesn't keep it's shape & just after a few months the back straps have discolored & worn.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has a padded divided inside to cushion items from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. It was smaller than we expected. But still very nice bag and we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ealgoo Kim

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from it
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, as cleverly built as a potato bag with no extra pockets, made out of thin nylon cloth. Useless in every possible way Expensive, even when not considering how useless it is
customer_reviews.author: OREN AMSELLEM

customer_reviews.title: Really great bag but I thought it should have more pockets ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great bag but I thought it should have more pockets than just the one zipper on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Geefucious

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage space for rackets and balls. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag with plenty of room for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: What bugs me the most is that the inner pockets are too deep - you have to dig in to get your wallet or phone. The material is made up of cheap, thin material and so you better pack it full or otherwise, will look like a collapsed tent. Also, the side pockets are sewn diagonally and so water bottle is not securely sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ferngully

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. The pockets are large enough to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. The pockets are large enough to hold a couple of tennis ball cans and shoes. Durable quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Cherukuri

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: When I put this bag on my back, the racquet compartment opens itself. The zip just can't keep it close.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio Silberberg

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack as a Father's day gift. It's really good, nice, simple, with inside pockets for cellphone, keys and enough room for shoes and the complete outfit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love them. They were excited by the autograph of ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Christmas gift for grand kids. They love them. They were excited by the autograph of Roger Federer. Seem to be made well of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag for tennis players
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my brother. He loves it so much and thinks it has a nice amount of room.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: It looks much darker than picture, almost black.
customer_reviews.text: It looks much darker than picture, almost black. Not sure if I got shipped the wrong color or its just darker than the pic
customer_reviews.author: JANINE H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag. Fits 6 racquets just fine
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag. Fits 6 racquets just fine. Had it for almost a year and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: NIce quality, but other than small side pockets two ...
customer_reviews.text: NIce quality, but other than small side pockets two really large compartments so if only carrying 4 rackets and putting clothes, tennis ball cans etc in things go all over in the large bag. My previoius bag had 3 large compartment and two small side bags and things stayed better compartmentalized. If you are carrying more rackets and less clothes etc than it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bag, good quality and looks cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Maiava

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this bag, it is roomy and stylish! The quality is also amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Galli

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality ever. It shouldnt be a Wilson’s product. never ever buy it.
customer_reviews.author: andre ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it looks great and has all the pockets my husband needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far very nice bag and just the right size for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Backpack for tennis racquets?
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack. I thought there was some special "thing" that made it a racquet backpack, but you really just leave the zipper partly open to allow the handles to stick out. Don't know exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag for the price with a great all black ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have backpack-style tennis bag when you walk in to court. It's a great bag for the price with a great all black sleek design. Downside: No thermal compartment. I have to bring it inside my house instead of leaving it the car but if you don't care about your strings then this one is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got the bag for my dad and he loved that it was so light while my mom loved ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the bag for my dad and he loved that it was so light while my mom loved that it was a dark color so it's a lot more low maintenance than his last bag. The only thing missing would be a shoulder strap just to have as an option in case you happen to already be carrying another backpack.
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: Not adequate for daily tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: Too small to be an effective tennis bag. Good for a school kid, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: rob damiani

customer_reviews.title: NOT gray
customer_reviews.text: It’s pitch black. NOT like graphite gray as in picture. It’s also not a hard shell type , again as shown in picture. Nice enough though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sung

customer_reviews.title: ... gift and I know that the person is very happy with the bag and enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: The bag was a gift and I know that the person is very happy with the bag and enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I do not like it any more. I would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zippers - Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The bag​ looks great but after about a month the zippers broke one by one until only 90 days all of the zippers are broken and the bag has to be replaced. Very disappointed in the quality of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wilson Federer Tennis Bag Series
product_meta.description: The Federer DNA Backpack is a tennis player's dream, blending a slick, modern design with durable composition and upgraded functionality for the ultimate package. An interior mesh pocket serves to keep contents in place, while a new Thermoguard pocket on the side helps keep water and snacks cold. Federer fans can appreciate Roger's legendary signature emblazoned on the front.
feature_bullets: Updated modern Black PU molded side panels
Black rubber screen print logo & silver RF signature on each side
2 main compartments for equipment and Apparel - both lined with thermo guard to protect against extreme heat
2 exterior side pockets for personal storage
Ergonomic backpack straps & carrying handles and improved zipper functionality

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
